column1: ms. marlene ann rollins personius. mar 20
column3: 2015 graveside services for marlene ann rollins personius will be held at pleasant grove where she will be laid to rest beside her mother
column7: at 3:00 pm with pastor nathaniel wright officiating. full obituary to follow shortly. upcoming events. burialjun 25. 3:00 pm pleasant grove. pleasant grove road. ithaca
